agent_purpose: Generates engaging LinkedIn posts with AI-generated images based on topic, key points, tone, and length preferences
description: Tests the LinkedIn Post Generator with a professional topic about AI and work, expecting post text with hashtags and a matching professional image

example_response.post_text:
🚀 5 Tips for Effective Remote Team Collaboration 🚀

1️⃣ Choose the Right Communication Tools: Use platforms like Slack, Zoom, or Teams to keep everyone connected and information flowing.

2️⃣ Embrace Asynchronous Work: Encourage team members to share updates and tasks in shared docs or project boards so progress doesn't depend on syncing schedules.

3️⃣ Set Clear Expectations: Define roles, responsibilities, and deadlines to keep everyone aligned, regardless of location.

4️⃣ Schedule Regular Check-ins: Brief stand-up meetings foster accountability and give space to address blockers.

5️⃣ Prioritize Team Building: Plan virtual coffee breaks or games to build trust and keep morale high.

Remote success is built on strong, intentional collaboration! 

How does your team stay connected across distances?

#RemoteWork #TeamCollaboration #AsyncWork #DigitalTeams #Leadership
